the Arisen have an important duty.

and resolve the problems there.

It's an exceptionally troublesome monster—
several Arisen have been dispatched so far,
but they all end up running back for their lives.
Well then— will you give it a try? Experience is valuable, after all.

column3:
ほう――仕事が無事終わったか
ごくろうだったな
column4:
Oh— so the job was completed safely?
Well done.

column3:
しかし、嘆願書は次から次へと舞い込んでくる
気が向いたら、また頼むよ
column4:
Still, petitions keep pouring in one after another.
If you're willing, I'll be counting on you again.

column3:
ほう！　――思ったより早かったな
まだおまえさんには早かったかと思っていたんだ
どうやら見くびっていたようだ
column4:
Oh! That was faster than I expected.
I thought it might still be too soon for you.
It seems I underestimated you.

column3:
さて、嘆願書は幾らでもあるぞ
気が向いたら、また力を貸してくれ
column4:
Now then, there's no shortage of petitions.
If you feel inclined, lend us your strength again.

column3:
なんと！　あの魔物を倒したのか！
これは快挙だぞ――素晴らしいことだ
おまえの資質は
レオが見込んだ以上のものかもしれないな
column4:
What!? You defeated that monster!?
That's a remarkable achievement— truly splendid.
Your potential may exceed
even what Leo saw in you.

column3:

これからも時間を作って
聞き入れてやってほしい
頼んだぞ
column4:
These petitions are the cries of the people
from all across Lestania.
I hope you'll continue to make time
to hear them out. I'm counting on you.

column3:
おや――ここで何をしている？
嘆願を聞き入れたからには
ゆっくりしているひまはないぞ？
column4:
Oh— what are you doing here?
Once you've accepted a petition,
there's no time to slack, you know?

column3:
この辺りで妙な魔物が出るようになったって
聞いて、退治依頼を受けたんだけどさ
何よこれ――
column4:
I heard that some strange monster started appearing around here,
so I took on an extermination request, but…
What is this—

column3:
これはなんだろう――建物？
明らかに、ここがねぐらよね
見たところあんたも同業でしょ？
column4:
What could this be— a building?
This must be its lair.
You seem to be in the same line of work as me, right?

column3:
あ！　だったらさ、この依頼書の魔物を
見つけたら代わりにやっつけてくれないかな
ここに入るの、な～んか気が進まないのよね
column4:
Ah! In that case, if you find the monster listed in this request,
could you take it out for me instead?
I just don't feel like going in there.

column3: ね？　報酬の６割あんたにゆずるからさ！
column4:
ね？　報酬の６割あんたにゆずるからさ！

あたしはここで待ってるから、無理しないで

column4:

I'll wait here, so don't push yourself.
If you think it's dangerous, come back out.

column3: 中で死なれたら、さすがに寝ざめが悪いもの――

column3:

代わりに倒してもらって悪いわね
column4:

Sorry for making you take it down in my place.

column3:
はい、約束の報酬６割分よ
また会ったらよろしくね
column4:
Here, the promised 60% of the reward.
Let's work together again next time we meet.

column3: ああ、お帰り！　どうだった？
column4: Ah, welcome back! How did it go?

column3:
へえ、倒してくれたんだ、さすがね！
頼まれてくれてありがとう
column4:
Wow, you really defeated it—impressive!
Thanks for taking the request.

column3:

column4:
Here, the promised 80% of the reward.

column4: —Ah, welcome back! I'm so glad you made it back safely.

column3:
苦労したって顔してるね
でも、その感じだと魔物を仕留めることが

column4:
You look like you had a rough time.
But from that look,
you managed to finish off the monster—!!

column3:
無茶な頼みを聞いてもらって感謝してるわ
はい、これはあたしが受け取るはずだった報酬よ
またどこかで会ったらよろしくね
column4:
Thanks for agreeing to such a reckless request.
Here— the reward I was supposed to receive.
Let's work together again somewhere.

column3: 中はどう？　あの魔物はいた？
column4: How was it inside? Was the monster there?

column3:
あぶないと思ったら逃げてよね
頼んだ手前、あんたに死なれたら寝ざめが悪いから
column4:
If you think it's dangerous, run, okay?
After asking you to do this, I wouldn't sleep well if you died.

column3:

通りかからないかなぁ
column4:
A knight, an Arisen, anyone else—
I wonder if someone else might pass by...

column3:

頼みがあるんだが聞いてくれないかな
column4:
Oh? You look like a seasoned adventurer—
would you hear me out on a request?

column3:

いるんだが、現在ハイデル南部は異様に
瘴気が溜まった状態になっていてね――
column4:
I study unusual phenomena across Lestania,
and right now, southern Hidell has an abnormal
concentration of miasma there—

column3:

男がいたらしい
その恨みが何らかの形で影響しているとも
考えられる
column4:
Upon investigating, it seems a man had once laid
a curse on Tel Village and then disappeared.
It's possible his grudge is influencing things somehow.

column3:
強く影響が出ているとすれば、男が最後に消えた
旧墓地が怪しいと踏んだが、どうもここでは

となるとハイデル教会の地下霊廟――
column4:
If the influence is strong, I suspected the old graveyard
where the man vanished would be the source,
but it doesn't seem to be here.
Which leaves the underground catacombs of the Hidell church—

column3:

瘴気による異変が起こっていないか

See whether any anomalies caused by the miasma have occurred.

column3:

よろしく頼んだよ

実際どうかは知らないが、それが本当なら
どんな恐ろしい魔物がいても不思議じゃない
column4:
The abandoned Hidell church is said to be infamous—
rumored to have concealed a heretical chapel.
I don't know if it's true, but if it is,
it wouldn't be surprising to find terrifying monsters there.

column3:
十分注意して、調査にあたってくれ
取り返しの付かない事になる前に
column4:
Proceed with great caution as you investigate,
before it becomes irreversible.

column3:

おそらく瘴気に引き寄せられたんだろう
column4:
I see… so such a monster was there.
It was probably drawn in by the miasma.

column3:
だが、退治してくれたならこれでしばらくは
大丈夫だな
column4:
But since you dealt with it,
things should be fine for a while.

column3:
君に頼んで良かったよ！
ありがとう
column4:
I'm glad I asked you!
Thank you.

column3:
――おお、そんな魔物まで現れていたのか
おそらく瘴気に引き寄せられたんだろう
恐ろしいな、呪いの力は
column4:
Oh… so even such a monster had appeared.
It was likely drawn in by the miasma.
The power of curses is truly frightening.

column3:
しかし、さすがだ！
そんな魔物を退治してくれるとは
これでまた当分大丈夫だな
column4:
Still, impressive!
To think you'd defeat such a monster—
this should keep things safe for quite some time.

column3:
君に頼んで良かったよ！
ありがとう
column4:
I'm glad I asked you!
Thank you.

column3:
――なんと！　そんな魔物がいたのか！？
もし村が襲われていたら大惨事になるところだ
危ないところだった
column4:
What!? A monster like that was there!?
If it had attacked the village, it would've been a catastrophe.
That was a close call.

column3:
しかし、素晴らしいな君は！
それほどの魔物まで退治してしまうとは
感銘を受けたよ
column4:
Still, you're remarkable!
To defeat a monster of that caliber—
I'm deeply impressed.

column3:
君のような覚者が守ってくれるから
未然に防がれている危機は多いんだろう
本当に感謝するよ
column4:
Because Arisen like you protect us,
many crises are likely prevented before they happen.
You have my deepest thanks.

column3:
――取り返しのつかない事態が
起こってなければいいんだが
column4:
I just hope nothing irreversible
has already happened.

column3:

白竜の力が弱まったせいなのかな――
column4:
Perhaps the reason such disturbances have become so frequent
is because the White Dragon's power is weakening—

column3:

ただでさえぎりぎりやってるってのに
何かに店の倉庫を荒らされちまったんだよ！
column4:
Honestly—it's one thing after another!
We're barely scraping by as it is,
and something's gone and ransacked my shop's storeroom!

column3:
許せない、二度と来ないよう
こらしめて頂戴！
後でお礼はするからさ
column4:
I won't stand for it—
teach them a lesson so they never come back!
I'll make it worth your while afterward.

column3:
あいつら、夜に限って来るんだよ！
ああ、お陰で不安で眠れないし
いまいましいったらないね！
column4:
They only ever come at night!
Because of them, I'm too anxious to sleep—
it's infuriating!

後でお礼はするからさ

泣きたくなっちまう
column4:

I keep thinking I might get killed—
sleep's the last thing on my mind.
I feel like crying.

column3:

戻ってきたりしないだろうね？
column4:
Is it really all right now?
They won't come back, will they?

column3:
まぁいいわ、その時はまた頼む
ことにするよ
column4:
Well, if they do,
I'll ask you again.

どうやら偵察部隊らしい

south of Gritten Fortress.

this has always been human land.

to make sure those monsters know
that humans still live here.

called this village remote and abandoned,

column3:
なんという幸運だろうね
こんなに困っている時にあんたに会えるなんて！
column4:
What incredible luck,
to run into you at a time like this!

column3:
今、倒した魔物の数を仲間と競ってるんだ
でも、俺、負けそうでな
というわけで、力を貸してほしい
column4:
I'm competing with my friend
over how many monsters we've defeated.
But I'm about to lose,
so I'd like you to lend me a hand.

column3:
魔物はおそろしく強いし数も多い
でも、あんたならきっとやれる！
根拠はないが、そんな気がする
じゃあ、あとで
column4:
The monsters are terrifyingly strong and numerous.
But I know you can do it!
I have no proof—just a feeling.
See you later.

column3:
よお！　頑張ってくれたみたいだな
でも、なかなか魔物は減らないな
え？　競争相手の仲間？
そりゃあ、あんた――あんただよ
column4:
Hey! Looks like you really put in the work.
Still, the monsters just keep coming.
Huh? The friend I was competing against?
Well, it's you— of course.

column3:
こんな感じで、魔物退治ができたら
楽しいと思ってな
まあ、今回は俺の勝ちってことで！
column4:
I thought it'd be fun
to hunt monsters like this.
Well, let's say this round's my win!

column3: じゃあ、またな
column4: See you later.

column3:
よお！　頑張ってくれたみたいだな
でも、なかなか魔物は減らないな
え？　競争相手の仲間？
そりゃあ、あんた――あんただよ
column4:
Hey! Looks like you really put in the work.
Still, the monsters just don't seem to be thinning out.
Huh? The friend I was competing against?
Well, it's you— of course.

column3:
こんな感じで、魔物退治ができたら
楽しいと思ってよ
というか、ずいぶん頑張って倒したみたいだな
よし、じゃあ、今回は引き分けにしよう
column4:
I thought hunting monsters like this would be fun.
That said, you really went all out taking them down.
All right—let's call this one a draw.

column3: じゃあ、またな
column4: See you around.

column3:
よお！　頑張ってくれたみたいだな
でも、なかなか魔物は減らないな
え？　競争相手の仲間？
そりゃあ、あんた――あんただよ
column4:
Hey! Looks like you really put in the work.
Still, the monsters just keep coming.
Huh? The friend I was competing against?
Well, it's you— of course.

column3:
こんな感じで、魔物退治ができたら
楽しいと思ってよ
というか、あんた強いのとばかり戦ってたな
よし、じゃあ、今回はあんたの勝ちだ！
column4:
I thought hunting monsters like this would be fun.
And you were taking on only the strong ones, too.
All right—this round's your win!

column3: じゃあ、またな
column4: See you around.

column3:
あら？　ずいぶん手こずっているみたいだな
調子でも悪いのか？
column4:
Oh? You look like you're having a rough time.
Feeling off or something?

column3:
ああ、 ちょうど良いところに
キミ、言わずとも判るよ―――覚者だろう
お願いがあるんだ
column4:
Ah, perfect timing.
I can tell without asking—you're an Arisen.
I have a favor to ask.

column3:
私、見ちゃったんだ
《平原の廃墟地下室》にオーク達が隠れているのを！
ね、これって覚者としては放っておけないよね
column4:
I saw it myself—
orcs hiding in the Plains Ruins Basement!
You can't just ignore that as an Arisen, right?

column3:
そういうわけで、討伐してきて欲しいんだ
やってくれるね？
皆のためになる事なんだから―――
column4:
So I want you to go exterminate them.
You'll do it, right?
It's for everyone's sake—

column3:
へぇ、本当にやっつけたんだ？
これで安心して仕事ができるよ、ありがとう
あ――私はいわゆるトレジャーハンターなんだ
column4:
Oh? You really took them out?
Now I can work without worry—thank you.
Ah—I'm what you'd call a treasure hunter.

column3:
騙してごめんよ
でも皆のためになる事だろう？
旅で見つけたお宝あげるから許してよ――
column4:
Sorry for deceiving you.
But it was for everyone's benefit, right?
I'll give you some treasure I found on my travels—so forgive me.

column3:
キミが来るまで、ここで思案してたのさ――
高所は、頭が冴えて考え事にぴったりだからね
私はまだここで待ってるから、よろしく頼んだよ
column4:
I was thinking things over here until you arrived—
high places are perfect for clearing your head.
I'll be waiting here a bit longer, so I'm counting on you.

column3:
ああ、 ちょうど良いところに
キミ、言わずとも判るよ―――覚者だろう
お願いがあるんだ
column4:
Ah, perfect timing.
I can tell without asking—you're an Arisen.
I have a favor to ask.

column3:
私、見ちゃったんだ
《テルの枯れ井戸》にオーク達が隠れているのを！
ね、これって覚者としては放っておけないよね
column4:
I saw it myself—
orcs hiding in Tel's Withered Well!
You can't just ignore that as an Arisen, right?

column3:
そういうわけで、討伐してきて欲しいんだ
やってくれるね？
皆のためになる事なんだから―――
column4:
So I want you to go exterminate them.
You'll do it, right?
It's for everyone's sake—

column3:
ねぇねぇ――知ってる？
"怪盗団"が現れたんだって！
あたしたちの間じゃ、その噂でもちきりなの
column4:
Hey, hey—did you hear?
They say a phantom thief group has appeared!
That rumor's all anyone's talking about lately.

column3:
実はね、あたし――怪盗に会った事あるんだ
それどころか、助けてもらったの
気が付いたら、このカードを握っていた――
よく覚えてないけど、きっとそれが証拠よね？
column4:
Actually, I've met a phantom thief before—
more than that, they saved me.
When I came to, I was holding this card—
I don't remember much, but that must be proof, right?

column3:
なに、これが欲しいって――
ちょっと、本気で言ってるの？
――そうね、じゃああたしのお願い聞いてくれたら
考えてあげてもいいわよ
column4:
What, you want this?
Are you serious right now?
…All right—if you do me a favor,
I'll think about it.

column3:
彼氏と度胸試しに《血すすぎ河原》へ行く予定なの
だけど、万一何かあると嫌だから――
あなた腕が立ちそうだし、掃除してきてほしいの
魔物一匹残らずよ！　よろしくね
column4:
I'm going to the Blood-soaked Riverband with my boyfriend
to test my courage, but just in case something happens...
You look capable so I want you to clear out
the monsters— all of them! I'm counting on you.

column3:
そんなもの欲しそうな目で見られたって
このカードはあげないわよ――タダでは、ね
column4:
Even if you look at it like you really want it,
I'm not giving you this card—for free, that is.

column3:
さぁ、さっさと《血すすぎ河原》へ行って
あたしと彼のために、危険な魔物を
掃除してきてちょうだいな
column4:
Now hurry on over to the Blood-soaked Riverbank
and clear out those dangerous monsters
for me and my boyfriend.

column3:
やだ――本当に行ってきたの？
しかも、ちゃんと魔物も片づけてきてくれたんだ――
諦めると思ったのに、結構根性あるのね
column4:
No way... you really went there?
And you actually cleared out the monsters too.
I thought you'd give up, but you've got guts.

column3:
ホント――あなたの事、見直しちゃった
ねぇ――こんなカードより
もっとイイものあげよっか――？
column4:
Honestly, I see you in a new light now.
Hey, how about I give you something better
than a card like this?

column3:
うそうそ――冗談よ、冗談
そんなに怖い顔しないでよ
危ない目に遭わせちゃったんだし、
お礼はちゃんとするってば
column4:
Just kidding—relax, it was a joke.
Don't make such a scary face.
I put you in danger, after all,
so I'll make sure to thank you properly.

column3:
こんな小さな村だから、あたしの噂はすぐに広まって
今まで話した事もない輩まで押しかけて来るの――
そんな奴らを煙に巻く癖が、つい出ちゃったみたい
――とにかく、デート楽しんでくるわ！　ありがとね
column4:
It's such a small village that rumors about me spread fast,
even people I've never spoken to come crowding in.
I guess my habit of throwing people off slipped out.
Anyway, I'm off to enjoy my date! Thanks!

column3:
怪盗が姿を現したって噂の場所は、
《廃屋の地下室》よ――
column4:
The place rumored to have sightings of the phantom thief
is the Abandoned House Basement.

column3:
え？　彼氏はどうしたって？
相手は怪盗よ！
つまんない彼氏なんかと比べないでよ
column4:
Huh? What happened to my boyfriend?
I'm talking about a phantom thief!
Don't compare them to some boring boyfriend.

column3:
ああ、覚者さん！　
本当に行ってきてくれたのね――
どうだった？
column4:
Ah, Arisen!
You really went there after all—
how was it?

column3:
いたのは魔物だけで、怪盗の痕跡は特に無し――
そう、残念だわ
だけど、行ってきてくれてありがとう
column4:
There were only monsters—no sign of a phantom thief.
I see… that's disappointing.
Still, thank you for going.

column3:
――正直言うと、怪盗の記憶はほとんど無いの
何を言っていたかわからなかったし、
顔もぼんやりとしか――
だけど、あの頼もしい腕の感触だけは覚えてるわ
column4:
To be honest, I barely remember the phantom thief.
I don't know what they said,
and their face is just a blur—
but I do remember the feeling of those reliable arms.

column3:
ちょっと謎めいた感じだったけど――
彼氏――ルキーノとは逆のタイプだったから、
久しぶりにときめいちゃったの
ああ、ルキーノにも、そんな所があればいいのに――
column4:
They felt kind of mysterious—
the opposite of my boyfriend, Lucino,
so it made my heart flutter for the first time in ages.
If only Lucino had a side like that...

column3:
ねぇねぇ――知ってる？
今話題の"怪盗団"の噂！
実はね、あたし――怪盗に会った事あるんだ
column4:
Hey, hey—did you hear?
The buzz about the phantom thief group!
Actually, I've met a phantom thief before.

column3:
それどころか、助けてもらったの
あの日から、あの人の事が忘れられなくて――
顔は分からなかったけど、ワイルドで素敵な人だった
このレスタニアでは見ないタイプね
column4:
More than that, they saved me.
Since that day, I haven't been able to forget them.
I didn't see their face, but they were wild and wonderful.
Not the kind of person you see in Lestania.

column3:
ねぇ、あなたこのカードが欲しいんでしょう？
この怪盗のマークが書かれたカード――
だったら、見てきてほしい場所があるの
最近怪盗が姿を見せたって噂の場所――
column4:
Hey, you want this card, don't you?
The one with the phantom thief's mark on it—
if that's the case, there's somewhere I want you to check.
A place rumored to have seen the phantom thief recently—

column3:
《廃屋の地下室》ってところ
危険があるかもしれないから――
怪盗が本当にそこにいたのか、
見て来てもらえる？
column4:
A place called the Abandoned House Basement.
It might be dangerous—
could you go see whether the phantom thief
was really there?

column3:
《狩人の抜け穴》へ行って、様子を見て来てほしいの
そこが、あたしが怪盗に助けてもらった場所――
え？　怪盗に出会えたらどうするかって？
そうね――怪盗団に入れてもらおうかな
column4:
I want you to go to the Hunter's Hideout and see what it's like there.
That's where the phantom thief saved me—
Huh? What would I do if I met them again?
Let's see—I might ask to join the phantom thief group.

column3:
ああ、覚者さん！　
本当に行ってきてくれたのね――
どんな場所だった？
column4:
Ah, Arisen!
You really went there after all—
what kind of place was it?

column3:
――普通の洞窟？
そんな馬鹿な――いいえ、よくは覚えてないんだけど
もっと、特徴的な場所だったような――
レスタニアで、見た事も聞いた事もない所だったの
column4:
Just an ordinary cave...?
That can't be right… no, I don't remember clearly, but
it felt much more distinctive—
somewhere I'd never seen or heard of in all of Lestania.

column3:
一体どうなっているの――
夢でも見ていたのかしら？
このカードも、もしかしたら
誰かのイタズラだったのかも――
column4:
What is going on…?
Was it all just a dream?
Maybe this card, too,
was nothing more than someone's prank—

column3:
――とにかく、行ってきてくれてありがとね
お礼はちゃんとするつもりよ
ほら、これが欲しいのよね？
もう何のカードか定かじゃないけど――もらってよ
column4:
Anyway... thank you for going.
I fully intend to reward you.
Here—you wanted this, right?
I don't even know what kind of card it is anymore, but take it.

column3:
ねぇねぇ――知ってる？
"怪盗団"が現れたんだって！
今じゃ、その噂でもちきりよ
column4:
Hey, hey—did you hear?
They say a phantom thief group has appeared!
That rumor's everywhere now.

column3:
実はね、あたし――怪盗に会った事あるんだ
それどころか、助けてもらったの
よく覚えてないんだけど――
どこかに迷い込んで、そこから助けてもらったような
column4:
Actually, I've met a phantom thief before—
more than that, they saved me.
I don't remember it well, but—
I think I got lost somewhere, and they helped me escape.

column3:
それで、いつの間にかこのカードを握っていたの
――言わなくても分かるわ、これが欲しいんでしょ？
最近そういう人ばかりなの、あたしの周り
そうね――じゃあ、あたしのお願い聞いてくれる？
column4:
And before I knew it, I was holding this card.
—I don't need to ask, do I? You want it, right?
Lately, everyone around me's been like that.
All right—then will you do me a favor?

column3:
《狩人の抜け穴》へ行って、様子を見て来てほしいの
あたしが怪盗と会った場所――
覚えている特徴を挙げると、そこが怪しいみたいなの
もし怪盗を見かけたら、すぐに教えてね
column4:
I want you to go to the Hunter's Hideout and check it out.
It's where I met the phantom thief—
based on what I remember, that place seems suspicious.
If you spot the phantom thief, tell me right away.

column3:
《死者の小窟》で怪盗捜索中の騎士団が
集まっていたから、あなたに見て来てほしいの
――もし何も無かったら、縁が無かったんだと思って
すっぱり諦めるわ
column4:
I saw the Knight Order gathered at the Small Cave Tombs,
searching for the phantom thief, so I want you to check it out.
—If there's nothing there, I'll accept it wasn't meant to be
and give up completely.

column3:
ああ、覚者さん！　
本当に行ってきてくれたのね――
そこには何があったの？
column4:
Ah, Arisen!
You really went—
what was there?

column3:
――魔物だけ、か
騎士団が集まっていたのは、魔物のせいだったのね
これで完全に万策尽きたわ――
column4:
—Only monsters, huh.
So that's why the Knight Order was gathered there.
Now I'm completely out of options—

column3:
ええ、分かってる
もう怪盗を追いかけるのはこれっきり！
あーあ、つまんない――
平凡な毎日が、何か変わると思ってたのに
column4:
Yes, I know.
This is the last time I chase after the phantom thief!
sigh… how boring—
I thought my ordinary days might finally change.

column3:
ほら、このカードが欲しかったんでしょ？
お礼にあげるわ――もうあたしには必要ないから
明日からは――心に仮面をつけてでも
退屈に向き合っていかなきゃね
column4:
Here, you wanted this card, didn't you?
I'll give it to you as thanks—I don't need it anymore.
From tomorrow on... even if I have to wear a mask over my heart,
I'll face my boring life again.

column3:
ねぇねぇ――知ってる？
"怪盗団"が現れた、って噂！
実は、あたし怪盗に助けてもらったことが
あるんだけど――
column4:
Hey, hey—did you hear?
The rumor that a phantom thief group appeared!
Actually, I've been saved by a phantom thief before—

column3:
これだけ一生懸命探してるのに、尻尾も掴めないのよ
――ま、当然か
騎士団が必死になって探してるものを
あたしがそう簡単に見つけられるはずないわよね――
column4:
I've searched this hard, and still can't catch a trace.
—Well, of course.
There's no way I could easily find something
the Knight Order is desperately searching for—

column3:
だけど、助けてもらったときに
いつの間にか握っていたこのカード――
きっとこれは何かの意味があると思うのよね
――ねぇ、あなたにお願いがあるの
column4:
But this card I was holding without realizing it
when I was saved—
I'm sure it has some meaning.
—Hey, I have a favor to ask you.

column3:
怪盗捜索中の騎士団が《死者の小窟》に
集まっていたのをさっき見たわ
あそこにはきっと何かある――
危険かもしれないけど、様子を見て来てほしいの！
column4:
I just saw the Knight Order gathered
at the Small Cave Tombs searching for the phantom thief.
There has to be something there—
it may be dangerous, but please go check it out!

column3:
ああ、覚者様――
盗賊たちに追われてるの！
どうか――どうかお願い、助けて！
column4:
Ah, Arisen—
bandits are chasing me!
Please... please, I beg you, help me!

column3:
ああ、覚者様――
盗賊たちに追われてるの！
どうか――どうかお願い、助けて！
column4:
Ah, Arisen—
bandits are chasing me!
Please... please, I beg you, help me!

column3:
血も涙もない奴らなの！
心おきなく、やっつけて！
column4:
Those bastards are completely merciless!
Don't hold back, wipe them out!

column3:
ああ、覚者様――
盗賊たちに追われてるの！
どうか――どうかお願い、助けて！
column4:
Ah, Arisen—
bandits are chasing me!
Please... please, I beg you, help me!

column3:
わたしだけじゃないの！
このままだったらあいつら村に来ちゃう！！
家が焼かれたり、みんなが殺されたりしたら――！
column4:
I'm not the only one in danger!
At this rate, those bastards will end up at the village!!
If our homes burn down, or if everyone is killed...!

column3: ありがとう、覚者さま！
column4: Thank you, Arisen!

column3:
ありがとうございました、覚者さま！
怪我は大丈夫？
column4:
Thank you very much, Arisen!
Are you hurt?

column3:
ありがとうございました、覚者さま！
本当に強いですね！　素敵です！
うん、すっごく――！
column4:
Thank you very much, Arisen!
You're truly strong—wonderful!
Yes, really—!

column3:
大丈夫？　無理はしないでね
あいつらほんとにひどいから――
column4:
Are you all right? Don't push yourself.
They're truly awful—

column3:
まずいことになった
浜に魔物が集まってるそうじゃないか
column4:
This is bad.
I hear monsters are gathering on the shore.

column3:
あの辺りには船があるんだ
あれが壊されたりしたら――！
頼む、何とかできないか！？
column4:
There are boats over there.
If those get destroyed—!
Please, can't you do something!?

column3:
たっ、大変だ！
浜に魔物が集まってるらしいんだ
それも厄介そうなのが！
column4:
Th-this is bad!
It seems monsters are gathering on the shore—
and troublesome ones at that!

column3:
あの辺りには船があるんだ
あれが壊されたりしたら――！
頼む、何とかできないか！？
column4:
There are boats over there.
If those get destroyed—!
Please, can't you do something!?

column3:
ああ――、なんてこった！
浜に魔物が集まってるらしいんだ！
滅多にここらじゃ見ないような奴が！
column4:
Oh—what a disaster!
I hear monsters are gathering on the shore!
The kind you hardly ever see around here!

column3:
あの辺りには船があるんだ
あれが壊されたりしたら――！
頼む、何とかできないか！？
column4:
There are boats over there.
If those get destroyed—!
Please, can't you do something!?

column3: どうだった！？　船は無事かい？
column4: How did it go!? Are the boats safe?

column3:
そうか――助かったよ、アンタのおかげだ
うん？　おかしいかい？
遠出もできないボロ船を大事にしてるのが
column4:
I see—you saved us, thanks to you.
Huh? You think it's strange?
That I care so much about a rickety boat
that can't even travel far?

column3:
若いころからの相棒だ
俺と一緒にオンボロになったヤツを
見捨てる訳にはいかんだろ
column4:
It's been my partner since I was young.
I can't just abandon something
that's grown old alongside me.

column3: どうだった！？　船は無事かい？
column4: How did it go!? Are the boats safe?

column3:
そうか――助かったよ、アンタのおかげだ
うん？　おかしいかい？
遠出もできないボロ船を大事にしてるのが
column4:
I see—you saved us, thanks to you.
Huh? You think it's strange?
That I care so much about a rickety boat
that can't even travel far?

column3:
若いころからの相棒だ
俺と一緒にオンボロになったヤツを
見捨てる訳にはいかんだろ
column4:
It's been my partner since I was young.
I can't just abandon something
that's grown old alongside me.

column3: どうだった！？　船は無事かい？
column4: How did it go!? Are the boats safe?

column3:

column4:

I can't just abandon something

Do whatever it takes to protect them!

column4:

I usually deliver supplies to old man Rudolfo, the keeper,
but today there seem to be more monsters than usual.

column3:

爺さんには、あんたも世話になるかも
しれないしさ
column4:
Could you go in my place? Please.
You might end up relying on the old man someday too.

column4:

You've come on Rosa's behalf.
Forgive my rudeness.

海を眺めていくといい
column4:
If you have time, climb the lighthouse
and gaze out at the sea.

広大なるものを感じ、己を見つめ直す
よい機会になろうて
column4:
The sea is fair to all—truly a fine thing.
Feeling its vastness
is a good chance to reflect upon oneself.

column3:
お疲れさま
大変だったかい？
column4:
Good work.
Was it tough?

column3:

隠居してから何年も灯台守を続けてくれてるのさ
灯台は代々、そうやって守られてきたそうだよ
column4:
Old man Rudolfo used to be an impressive member of the Knight Order.
Even after retiring, he's kept watch over the lighthouse for years.
That's how the lighthouse has been protected for generations.

column3:
大きな魔物がやって来た時とかは
あの人が知らせてくれて、みんなで逃げたんだよ
column4:
When large monsters came,
he'd warn us, and we'd all flee together.

column3: 元気でやっていてほしいね
column4: I hope he stays well.

that would be quite a problem indeed—

気配を感じるのは夜の間だけでの

Ah, Arisen, perfect timing!

there's a ruin some distance away,
and monsters have gotten into its basement.

立場を越えてどうか一つ

column4:

Please set aside rank

column4:

column3:
でも、正直自分にはとても手に負える

絶対殺される自信があります！！
column4:
But honestly, it's far beyond what I can handle—
I'm certain I'd be killed!!

column3:

この通りであります！
立場を越えてどうか一つ
村人を助けると思って協力して下さい！
column4:
Arisen, please!!
I beg you!
Set aside rank and help us,
for the sake of the villagers!

column3:
おお、退治してくれたのでありますね
ありがとうございました
column4:
Oh, you defeated them!
Thank you very much.

column3:
――うう、しかし自分、不甲斐ないです！
精進し、このくらい対処できるよう頑張らねば
column4:
—Ugh, how shameful of me!
I must train harder until I can handle this much myself.

column3:

内緒にしてほしいであります
column4:

please keep it secret
that the Arisen helped me.

column3:
おおっ、退治してくれたのでありますか！
ご助力ありがとうございました！
column4:
Oh! You defeated them!?
Thank you for your assistance!

column3:

今の警備体制はどう考えても不十分
覚者隊の助力を公式にお願いできれば
よいのでありますが
column4:
—Still, against powerful monsters,
our current guard setup is clearly insufficient.
If only we could officially request the Arisen Corps' aid—

column3:
うーむ、そんな事を言ってると
団長からまた叱られるでありますね
column4:
Hmm… saying things like that
will just get me scolded by the captain again.

column3:
おおおっ、退治してくれたのでありますか！
さすがです！　ありがとうございました！
column4:
Ohhh! You defeated them!?
As expected! Thank you very much!

column3:
あれほどの魔物相手となると、やはり
騎士団では対処ができないことも――
残念ですが、それが本心であります
column4:
Against monsters like that,
there are times even the Knight Order cannot cope—
regrettable, but that's the truth.

column3:
村の常駐警備担当を、覚者隊からも出して
貰えると安心であります
神官殿にもぜひ、そのようにお伝えを
column4:
We'd feel safer if some permanent guards
came from the Arisen Corps as well.
Please convey this to the priest, too.

column3:
どうしたでありますか？
自分のことは構わず行って下さい
少し遅れて向かいますので！

What's wrong?
Don't worry about me—go on ahead.
I'll follow shortly!

column3:

この辺りは危険な魔物もいるし
めったに人なんて来ないのに
column4:
Wow, coming to a place like this—how reckless.
There are dangerous monsters around here,
and hardly anyone ever comes.

column3:
私は、浜辺に流れ着くモノが好きで
色々見て回ってるの
何か見つけたら、私にも教えてね
column4:
I like things that wash up on the shore,
so I wander around looking for them.
If you find something, let me know too.
